headline: Goldman Sachs Refocuses ActiveBeta ETF On Rules Based Factor Growth
summary: Goldman Sachs Asset Management is overhauling the ActiveBeta World Low Vol Plus Equity ETF, including a new name, ticker, and investment objective. The fund will shift to tracking a rules based index that uses factor investing principles while broadening its global equity focus. For you as an investor looking at NYSE:GS, this move sits within Goldman Sachs’ broader push in ETFs and rules based products, an area that has drawn steady attention from both institutions and individuals. Factor...
